member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfGauge.XForms.CharacterType
member.summary: The Digital Characters can be drawn in 4 different segments as follows.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfGauge.XForms.CharacterType.SegmentSeven
member.summary: The Digital Characters rather than using the alphabets, these are mainly used to display numbers.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfGauge.XForms.CharacterType.SegmentFourteen
member.summary: These type of characters are used to display both alphabets and numbers.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfGauge.XForms.CharacterType.SegmentSixteen
member.summary: These type of characters are also used to display both alphabets and numbers.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfGauge.XForms.CharacterType.EightCrossEightDotMatrix
member.summary: These type of characters are used to display special characters along with the alphabets and numbers.
